name: Penguins Can Fly (dorado5115, i343SPARK, devasyaarathy, Omaredu)
name_original: Penguins Can Fly (dorado5115, i343SPARK, devasyaarathy, Omaredu)
description:
It is about a penguin with a jetpack in space, that needs to kill the bird of wisdom.

Game design: Deva, Omaredu, Dorado, Pablo 

Music and sound: Pablo, Deva
 
Visuals: Omaredu

Development and programming: Dorado, Omaredu
